name: Finset.sdiff_val
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s₁ s₂).val (HSub.hSub s₁.val s₂.val)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_val (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : (s₁ \ s₂).val = s₁.val - s₂.val :=
  rfl

name: Finset.mem_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
a : α
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (SDiff.sdiff s t) a) (And (Membership.mem s a) (Not (Membership.mem t a)))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_sdiff : a ∈ s \ t ↔ a ∈ s ∧ a ∉ t :=
  mem_sub_of_nodup s.2

name: Finset.inter_sdiff_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s₁ (SDiff.sdiff s₂ s₁)) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
@[simp]
theorem inter_sdiff_self (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : s₁ ∩ (s₂ \ s₁) = ∅ :=
  eq_empty_of_forall_not_mem <| by
    simp only [mem_inter, mem_sdiff]; rintro x ⟨h, _, hn⟩; exact hn h

name: Finset.not_mem_sdiff_of_mem_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
a : α
h : Membership.mem t a
⊢ Not (Membership.mem (SDiff.sdiff s t) a)
decl:
theorem not_mem_sdiff_of_mem_right (h : a ∈ t) : a ∉ s \ t := by
  simp only [mem_sdiff, h, not_true, not_false_iff, and_false]

name: Finset.not_mem_sdiff_of_not_mem_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
a : α
h : Not (Membership.mem s a)
⊢ Not (Membership.mem (SDiff.sdiff s t) a)
decl: theorem not_mem_sdiff_of_not_mem_left (h : a ∉ s) : a ∉ s \ t := by simp [h]

name: Finset.union_sdiff_of_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset s t
⊢ Eq (Union.union s (SDiff.sdiff t s)) t
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_of_subset (h : s ⊆ t) : s ∪ t \ s = t :=
  sup_sdiff_cancel_right h

name: Finset.sdiff_union_of_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset s₁ s₂
⊢ Eq (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s₂ s₁) s₁) s₂
decl:
theorem sdiff_union_of_subset {s₁ s₂ : Finset α} (h : s₁ ⊆ s₂) : s₂ \ s₁ ∪ s₁ = s₂ :=
  (union_comm _ _).trans (union_sdiff_of_subset h)

name: Finset.inter_sdiff_assoc
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Inter.inter s t) u) (Inter.inter s (SDiff.sdiff t u))
decl:
/-- See also `Finset.sdiff_inter_right_comm`. -/
lemma inter_sdiff_assoc (s t u : Finset α) : (s ∩ t) \ u = s ∩ (t \ u) := inf_sdiff_assoc ..

name: Finset.sdiff_inter_right_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (SDiff.sdiff s t) u) (SDiff.sdiff (Inter.inter s u) t)
decl:
/-- See also `Finset.inter_sdiff_assoc`. -/
lemma sdiff_inter_right_comm (s t u : Finset α) : s \ t ∩ u = (s ∩ u) \ t := sdiff_inf_right_comm ..

name: Finset.inter_sdiff_left_comm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter s (SDiff.sdiff t u)) (Inter.inter t (SDiff.sdiff s u))
decl: lemma inter_sdiff_left_comm (s t u : Finset α) : s ∩ (t \ u) = t ∩ (s \ u) := inf_sdiff_left_comm ..

name: Finset.sdiff_inter_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Inter.inter (SDiff.sdiff s₂ s₁) s₁) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_inter_self (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : s₂ \ s₁ ∩ s₁ = ∅ :=
  inf_sdiff_self_left

name: Finset.sdiff_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s₁ s₁) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
protected theorem sdiff_self (s₁ : Finset α) : s₁ \ s₁ = ∅ :=
  _root_.sdiff_self

name: Finset.sdiff_inter_distrib_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (Inter.inter t u)) (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) (SDiff.sdiff s u))
decl:
theorem sdiff_inter_distrib_right (s t u : Finset α) : s \ (t ∩ u) = s \ t ∪ s \ u :=
  sdiff_inf

name: Finset.sdiff_inter_self_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (Inter.inter s t)) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_inter_self_left (s t : Finset α) : s \ (s ∩ t) = s \ t :=
  sdiff_inf_self_left _ _

name: Finset.sdiff_inter_self_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (Inter.inter t s)) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_inter_self_right (s t : Finset α) : s \ (t ∩ s) = s \ t :=
  sdiff_inf_self_right _ _

name: Finset.sdiff_empty
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s EmptyCollection.emptyCollection) s
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_empty : s \ ∅ = s :=
  sdiff_bot

name: Finset.sdiff_subset_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u v : Finset α
hst : HasSubset.Subset s t
hvu : HasSubset.Subset v u
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (SDiff.sdiff s u) (SDiff.sdiff t v)
decl:
@[mono, gcongr]
theorem sdiff_subset_sdiff (hst : s ⊆ t) (hvu : v ⊆ u) : s \ u ⊆ t \ v :=
  subset_of_le (sdiff_le_sdiff hst hvu)

name: Finset.sdiff_subset_sdiff_iff_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t r : Finset α
hs : HasSubset.Subset s r
ht : HasSubset.Subset t r
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset (SDiff.sdiff r s) (SDiff.sdiff r t)) (HasSubset.Subset t s)
decl:
theorem sdiff_subset_sdiff_iff_subset {r : Finset α} (hs : s ⊆ r) (ht : t ⊆ r) :
    r \ s ⊆ r \ t ↔ t ⊆ s := by
  simpa only [← le_eq_subset] using sdiff_le_sdiff_iff_le hs ht

name: Finset.coe_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (↑(SDiff.sdiff s₁ s₂)) (SDiff.sdiff ↑s₁ ↑s₂)
decl:
@[simp, norm_cast]
theorem coe_sdiff (s₁ s₂ : Finset α) : ↑(s₁ \ s₂) = (s₁ \ s₂ : Set α) :=
  Set.ext fun _ => mem_sdiff

name: Finset.union_sdiff_self_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s (SDiff.sdiff t s)) (Union.union s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem union_sdiff_self_eq_union : s ∪ t \ s = s ∪ t :=
  sup_sdiff_self_right _ _

name: Finset.sdiff_union_self_eq_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) t) (Union.union s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_union_self_eq_union : s \ t ∪ t = s ∪ t :=
  sup_sdiff_self_left _ _

name: Finset.union_sdiff_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s t) s) (SDiff.sdiff t s)
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_left (s t : Finset α) : (s ∪ t) \ s = t \ s :=
  sup_sdiff_left_self

name: Finset.union_sdiff_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s t) t) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_right (s t : Finset α) : (s ∪ t) \ t = s \ t :=
  sup_sdiff_right_self

name: Finset.union_sdiff_cancel_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : Disjoint s t
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s t) s) t
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_cancel_left (h : Disjoint s t) : (s ∪ t) \ s = t :=
  h.sup_sdiff_cancel_left

name: Finset.union_sdiff_cancel_right
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : Disjoint s t
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s t) t) s
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_cancel_right (h : Disjoint s t) : (s ∪ t) \ t = s :=
  h.sup_sdiff_cancel_right

name: Finset.union_sdiff_symm
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s (SDiff.sdiff t s)) (Union.union t (SDiff.sdiff s t))
decl: theorem union_sdiff_symm : s ∪ t \ s = t ∪ s \ t := by simp [union_comm]

name: Finset.sdiff_union_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) (Inter.inter s t)) s
decl:
theorem sdiff_union_inter (s t : Finset α) : s \ t ∪ s ∩ t = s :=
  sup_sdiff_inf _ _

name: Finset.sdiff_idem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (SDiff.sdiff s t) t) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
theorem sdiff_idem (s t : Finset α) : (s \ t) \ t = s \ t :=
  _root_.sdiff_idem

name: Finset.subset_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Iff (HasSubset.Subset s (SDiff.sdiff t u)) (And (HasSubset.Subset s t) (Disjoint s u))
decl:
theorem subset_sdiff : s ⊆ t \ u ↔ s ⊆ t ∧ Disjoint s u :=
  le_iff_subset.symm.trans le_sdiff

name: Finset.sdiff_eq_empty_iff_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (SDiff.sdiff s t) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection) (HasSubset.Subset s t)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem sdiff_eq_empty_iff_subset : s \ t = ∅ ↔ s ⊆ t :=
  sdiff_eq_bot_iff

name: Finset.sdiff_nonempty
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (SDiff.sdiff s t).Nonempty (Not (HasSubset.Subset s t))
decl:
theorem sdiff_nonempty : (s \ t).Nonempty ↔ ¬s ⊆ t :=
  nonempty_iff_ne_empty.trans sdiff_eq_empty_iff_subset.not

name: Finset.empty_sdiff
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff EmptyCollection.emptyCollection s) EmptyCollection.emptyCollection
decl:
@[simp]
theorem empty_sdiff (s : Finset α) : ∅ \ s = ∅ :=
  bot_sdiff

name: Finset.insert_sdiff_of_not_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
x : α
h : Not (Membership.mem t x)
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Insert.insert x s) t) (Insert.insert x (SDiff.sdiff s t))
decl:
theorem insert_sdiff_of_not_mem (s : Finset α) {t : Finset α} {x : α} (h : x ∉ t) :
    insert x s \ t = insert x (s \ t) := by
  rw [← coe_inj, coe_insert, coe_sdiff, coe_sdiff, coe_insert]
  exact Set.insert_diff_of_not_mem _ h

name: Finset.insert_sdiff_of_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
t s : Finset α
x : α
h : Membership.mem t x
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Insert.insert x s) t) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
theorem insert_sdiff_of_mem (s : Finset α) {x : α} (h : x ∈ t) : insert x s \ t = s \ t := by
  rw [← coe_inj, coe_sdiff, coe_sdiff, coe_insert]
  exact Set.insert_diff_of_mem _ h

name: Finset.insert_sdiff_cancel
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
a : α
ha : Not (Membership.mem s a)
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Insert.insert a s) s) (Singleton.singleton a)
decl:
@[simp] lemma insert_sdiff_cancel (ha : a ∉ s) : insert a s \ s = {a} := by
  rw [insert_sdiff_of_not_mem _ ha, Finset.sdiff_self, insert_emptyc_eq]

name: Finset.insert_sdiff_insert
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
x : α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Insert.insert x s) (Insert.insert x t)) (SDiff.sdiff s (Insert.insert x t))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem insert_sdiff_insert (s t : Finset α) (x : α) : insert x s \ insert x t = s \ insert x t :=
  insert_sdiff_of_mem _ (mem_insert_self _ _)

name: Finset.insert_sdiff_insert'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
a b : α
hab : Ne a b
ha : Not (Membership.mem s a)
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Insert.insert a s) (Insert.insert b s)) (Singleton.singleton a)
decl:
lemma insert_sdiff_insert' (hab : a ≠ b) (ha : a ∉ s) : insert a s \ insert b s = {a} := by
  ext; aesop

name: Finset.cons_sdiff_cons
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
a b : α
hab : Ne a b
ha : Not (Membership.mem s a)
hb : Not (Membership.mem s b)
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Finset.cons a s ha) (Finset.cons b s hb)) (Singleton.singleton a)
decl:
lemma cons_sdiff_cons (hab : a ≠ b) (ha hb) : s.cons a ha \ s.cons b hb = {a} := by
  rw [cons_eq_insert, cons_eq_insert, insert_sdiff_insert' hab ha]

name: Finset.sdiff_insert_of_not_mem
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s : Finset α
x : α
h : Not (Membership.mem s x)
t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (Insert.insert x t)) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
theorem sdiff_insert_of_not_mem {x : α} (h : x ∉ s) (t : Finset α) : s \ insert x t = s \ t := by
  refine Subset.antisymm (sdiff_subset_sdiff (Subset.refl _) (subset_insert _ _)) fun y hy => ?_
  simp only [mem_sdiff, mem_insert, not_or] at hy ⊢
  exact ⟨hy.1, fun hxy => h <| hxy ▸ hy.1, hy.2⟩

name: Finset.sdiff_subset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ HasSubset.Subset (SDiff.sdiff s t) s
decl: @[simp] theorem sdiff_subset {s t : Finset α} : s \ t ⊆ s := le_iff_subset.mp sdiff_le

name: Finset.sdiff_ssubset
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset t s
ht : t.Nonempty
⊢ HasSSubset.SSubset (SDiff.sdiff s t) s
decl:
theorem sdiff_ssubset (h : t ⊆ s) (ht : t.Nonempty) : s \ t ⊂ s :=
  sdiff_lt (le_iff_subset.mpr h) ht.ne_empty

name: Finset.union_sdiff_distrib
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s₁ s₂ t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s₁ s₂) t) (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s₁ t) (SDiff.sdiff s₂ t))
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_distrib (s₁ s₂ t : Finset α) : (s₁ ∪ s₂) \ t = s₁ \ t ∪ s₂ \ t :=
  sup_sdiff

name: Finset.sdiff_union_distrib
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t₁ t₂ : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (Union.union t₁ t₂)) (Inter.inter (SDiff.sdiff s t₁) (SDiff.sdiff s t₂))
decl:
theorem sdiff_union_distrib (s t₁ t₂ : Finset α) : s \ (t₁ ∪ t₂) = s \ t₁ ∩ (s \ t₂) :=
  sdiff_sup

name: Finset.union_sdiff_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (Union.union s t) t) (SDiff.sdiff s t)
decl:
theorem union_sdiff_self (s t : Finset α) : (s ∪ t) \ t = s \ t :=
  sup_sdiff_right_self

name: Finset.Nontrivial.sdiff_singleton_nonempty
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
c : α
s : Finset α
hS : s.Nontrivial
⊢ (SDiff.sdiff s (Singleton.singleton c)).Nonempty
decl:
theorem Nontrivial.sdiff_singleton_nonempty {c : α} {s : Finset α} (hS : s.Nontrivial) :
    (s \ {c}).Nonempty := by
  rw [Finset.sdiff_nonempty, Finset.subset_singleton_iff]
  push_neg
  exact ⟨by rintro rfl; exact Finset.not_nontrivial_empty hS, hS.ne_singleton⟩

name: Finset.sdiff_sdiff_left'
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff (SDiff.sdiff s t) u) (Inter.inter (SDiff.sdiff s t) (SDiff.sdiff s u))
decl:
theorem sdiff_sdiff_left' (s t u : Finset α) : (s \ t) \ u = s \ t ∩ (s \ u) :=
  _root_.sdiff_sdiff_left'

name: Finset.sdiff_union_sdiff_cancel
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
hts : HasSubset.Subset t s
hut : HasSubset.Subset u t
⊢ Eq (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) (SDiff.sdiff t u)) (SDiff.sdiff s u)
decl:
theorem sdiff_union_sdiff_cancel (hts : t ⊆ s) (hut : u ⊆ t) : s \ t ∪ t \ u = s \ u :=
  sdiff_sup_sdiff_cancel hts hut

name: Finset.sdiff_sdiff_eq_sdiff_union
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t u : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset u s
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (SDiff.sdiff t u)) (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) u)
decl:
theorem sdiff_sdiff_eq_sdiff_union (h : u ⊆ s) : s \ (t \ u) = s \ t ∪ u :=
  sdiff_sdiff_eq_sdiff_sup h

name: Finset.sdiff_sdiff_self_left
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (SDiff.sdiff s t)) (Inter.inter s t)
decl:
theorem sdiff_sdiff_self_left (s t : Finset α) : s \ (s \ t) = s ∩ t :=
  sdiff_sdiff_right_self

name: Finset.sdiff_sdiff_eq_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : HasSubset.Subset t s
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s (SDiff.sdiff s t)) t
decl:
theorem sdiff_sdiff_eq_self (h : t ⊆ s) : s \ (s \ t) = t :=
  _root_.sdiff_sdiff_eq_self h

name: Finset.sdiff_eq_sdiff_iff_inter_eq_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t₁ t₂ : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (SDiff.sdiff s t₁) (SDiff.sdiff s t₂)) (Eq (Inter.inter s t₁) (Inter.inter s t₂))
decl:
theorem sdiff_eq_sdiff_iff_inter_eq_inter {s t₁ t₂ : Finset α} :
    s \ t₁ = s \ t₂ ↔ s ∩ t₁ = s ∩ t₂ :=
  sdiff_eq_sdiff_iff_inf_eq_inf

name: Finset.union_eq_sdiff_union_sdiff_union_inter
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Eq (Union.union s t) (Union.union (Union.union (SDiff.sdiff s t) (SDiff.sdiff t s)) (Inter.inter s t))
decl:
theorem union_eq_sdiff_union_sdiff_union_inter (s t : Finset α) : s ∪ t = s \ t ∪ t \ s ∪ s ∩ t :=
  sup_eq_sdiff_sup_sdiff_sup_inf

name: Finset.sdiff_eq_self_iff_disjoint
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (SDiff.sdiff s t) s) (Disjoint s t)
decl:
theorem sdiff_eq_self_iff_disjoint : s \ t = s ↔ Disjoint s t :=
  sdiff_eq_self_iff_disjoint'

name: Finset.sdiff_eq_self
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
⊢ Iff (Eq (SDiff.sdiff s t) s) (Disjoint s t)
decl: @[deprecated (since := "2024-10-01")] alias sdiff_eq_self := sdiff_eq_self_iff_disjoint

name: Finset.sdiff_eq_self_of_disjoint
initialProofState:
α : Type u_1
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
s t : Finset α
h : Disjoint s t
⊢ Eq (SDiff.sdiff s t) s
decl:
theorem sdiff_eq_self_of_disjoint (h : Disjoint s t) : s \ t = s :=
  sdiff_eq_self_iff_disjoint.2 h
